entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind light except southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
